message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $90?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly reach an agreement at $92 for the product?
Hi Bob, I'm still open to negotiating. I'm willing to meet you at $94. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for your final offer. I'll make one last attempt to reach a compromise. Would you consider selling the product to me for $93?
Hi Bob, I'm willing to give you one more chance. I'll meet you at $96. This is my last offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to come to a fair agreement. My final offer is $95 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any higher. I'll meet you at $98. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I've reached my limit. I'm willing to pay $97 for the product. This is my final offer.
